statements: DELETE FROM network_traffic_monitor WHERE id = 1 AND protocol = 'TCP';
DELETE FROM network_traffic_monitor WHERE threat_level = 'high' AND port = 80;
DELETE FROM threat_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Malware' AND threat_level > 5;
DELETE FROM network_traffic WHERE source_ip = '192.168.0.1' AND destination_ip = '10.0.0.1';
DELETE FROM security_analyst WHERE department = 'IT Department';
DELETE FROM security_analysts WHERE name = 'John Smith';
